activities.statusHelpText: 'Draft' keeps it hidden, 'Published' makes it live.

activities.maximumAgeDescription: Maximum age allowed to participate (leave empty for no restriction)

support.title: Support
support.description: Get help with your account or contact our support team.
support.subject: Subject
support.subjectPlaceholder: What can we help you with?
support.messagePlaceholder: Please describe your issue in detail...

faq1.question: How do I update my activity details?
faq1.answer: You can update your activity details by going to the Activities section, selecting the activity you want to edit, and clicking on the Edit button.

faq2.question: How do I manage bookings?
faq2.answer: You can view and manage all your bookings in the Bookings section. From there, you can confirm, reschedule, or cancel bookings.

faq3.question: How do I get paid?
faq3.answer: Payments are processed automatically and transferred to your registered bank account. You can view your payment history in the Revenue section.
